meanings.definition: Columneas: a genus of flowering plants in the family Gesneriaceae.
meanings.sent1: The columneas in the garden have vibrant flowers.
meanings.sent2: I learned about columneas in my botany class.
meanings.sent3: The columneas in the greenhouse were gossiping about the roses.
meanings.sent4: Her love for columneas bloomed like the flowers themselves.
meanings.sent5: The columneas swayed gracefully in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: Columneas: plural form of columnea, referring to multiple plants in the genus Columnea.
meanings.sent1: We planted columneas in different colors in our backyard.
meanings.sent2: The columneas on the windowsill brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The columneas at the plant sale were having a party.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship grew as beautifully as the columneas in their garden.
meanings.sent5: The columneas added a splash of color to the dull surroundings.
